item.attr: Serenades for all occasions: Birthdays, Graduations, Weddings.
Serenatas para toda ocasión. Cumpleaños, bodas, graduaciones, despedidas.

D.C. Mariachi is an all Mexican Mariachi band with a variety of music from all parts of Mexico. Each member has years of experience playing their respective instrument. D.C. Mariachi will bring you a little piece of Mexican heritage to your event! Experience professional mariachi music at its best with D.C. Mariachi. We’re available for all special events!

Llame a D.C. Mariachi para celebrar sus Aniversarios, Bodas, cumpleaños y todo tipo de eventos familiares y sociales. Ofrecemos servicio de serenata de 7 canciones. Ofrecemos un show de 50 minutos. 15 años (sweet 15 and 16), bautizos, baby shower, cumpleaños, bodas, aniversarios. Despedida de solteras

EL MARIACHI GUANAJUATO DE MANUEL FIGUEROA – from Montreal Manuel Figueroa came to Montreal in 1973 with his father Don José Figueroa, most part of his life he has been working with him. The Group used to be called Los Viajeros. In the year 1984 the group was called El Mariachi Figueroa and is named like that since. Mr. Manuel Figueroa started to travel since he was very Young. His first trip was to Italy in 1979. His father sent him in his place for 22 days tour. He went and toured around the Quebec?s province, then Newfoundland and Nova Scotia, Toronto and Ottawa before he went to the USA. He toured in Chicago, Atlanta, St. Louis, Boston, New York, Philadelphia, Washington DC, Atlantic City, Cincinnati, North and south Carolina, Alabama, Memphis, St. Antonio Texas, Dallas, Houston, Wisconsin, Florida Vermont, Los Angeles and last Puerto Rico. In the year 2007 he makes career on his own by funding the group El Mariachi Guanajuato de Manuel Figueroa in June 2007.

Manuel Figueroa est arrivé à Montréal en 1973 avec sonpère Don José Figueroa avec qui il travailla la majeure partie de sa vie. Le groupe s’appelait Los Viajeros. En 1984 le groupe changea de nom pour El Mariachi Figueroa et il s’appelle toujours ainsi. M. Manuel Figueroa a commencé à voyager très jeune à l’étranger. Son premier voyage était en Italie en 1979. Son père l’a délégué à sa place pour une tournée de 22 jours. Il a parcouru la province de Québec, Terre Neuve, la Nouvelle- Écosse, Toronto et Ottawa avant d’aller aux E.U. Il a aussi parcouru Chicago, Atlanta, St. Louis, Boston, New York, Philadelphie, Washington DC, Atlantic City, Cincinnati, Caroline du nord et sud, Alabama, Memphis, St. Antonio Texas, Dallas, Houston, Wisconsin, Floride Vermont, Los Angeles et Puerto Rico. En 2007 il se retire du groupe Mariachi Figueroa pour continuer son chemin et son aventure. El Mariachi Guanajuato de Manuel Figueroa fut fondé par M. Manuel Figueroa au mois de juin 2007.
El Mariachi Guanajuato de Manuel Figueroa
We are a mariachi group composed of 10 members. We play music for all occasions in the Bay Area.
Nosotros somos un mariachi compuesto de 10 miembros. Nosotros tocamos musica para toda ocasion en la Area Bahia.

CT's first Mariachi of 20 years, Fiesta del Norte is the perfect entertainment for parties, weddings, concerts, quinceñeras, restaurants or any social event. We dress in traditional charro outfits playing standard repertoire plus many other Latin songs. Fiesta del Norte is a member of CT Commission on Culture and have an excellent interactive education program for schools. The band can perform from a duo to 6 piece so prices will vary. Liven up your next event with Fiesta del Norte!

Por mas de dos decadas el grupo Fiesta Del Norte ha ofrecido musica de mariachi al estado de CT y Nueva Inglaterra. Fiesta del Norte, el primer mariachi que CT pudo tener ofrece musica para toda ocasion,( bodas, conciertos,. Vistiendo el tradicional traje de charro, Fiesta del Norte, ofrece un exelente servicio interpretando musica de Mexico y de Latino Ameria. Fiesta del Norte es miembro de CT Commission on Culture and Tourism. El grupo tambien ofrece un programa interactivo especialtmente pensado para Escuelas.
Es un mariachi integrado por ocho músicos y la cantante Maribel Salinas.

We are a four piece all girl group playing Mexican,mostly mariachi music, We can play a show or just take requests, whatever the client prefers. We are also flexible on size and will work with the client to satisfy their musical and budgetary needs. Come see us at Beto's Grill in San Gabriel on Thursdays or Beto's Grill 2 in Temple City on Fridays. Join us on Facebook under Trio Bohemio!

Tambien somos flexibles de cantidad de integrantes y trabajaremos con el cliente para satisfacer sus necesidades musicales tal como financieros. Vengan a vernos en San Gabriel los jueves al Beto's Grill o los viernes in Temple City a Beto's 2. Juntanse con nosotras en Facebook bajo el nombre de Trio Bohemio!

Mariachi mexicanisimo, is available nationwide for all occasions and events; including: masses, weddings, birthdays, aniversaries, funerals, serenades, outdoor and indoor concerts, restaurants, nigth clubes, corporate events, clinics, television sidelining, acconpanying or backing up other artists and studio recording sessions,. Whether your occasion requires our full group or just a trio, we can provide quality entertainment to suit your need a budget.

Mariachi Mexicanisimo esta disponible para eventos nacionales para toda ocaciones incluyendo: misas, bodas, cumpleaños, aniversarios, funerales, serenatas, conciertos dentro o afuera, restaurantes, clubes nocturnos, eventos corporativos, clinicas, television, acompañando a otros artistas o sesion de grabacion, si su ocasion requiere nuestro grupo completo o solo trio. Podemos ofrecerle entreteniemiento de alta calidad para acomodar sus necesidades y presupuestos.

The Mariachi Agua Dulce began in 1996 and has since grown from 10 or 15 students in one group to an entire district offering classes! It is part of the Mariachi Scholarship Foundation, which awards academically successful Mariachi students money for college. Please visit the website or e-mail us if you want more information

Mariachi Aguila Azteca is a Youth Mariachi that plays the traditional Mariachi genre of music. With years of experience in this space, Mariachi Aguila Azteca has been enjoyed in many different venues. The Mariachi resides in the San Fernando Valley. The Mariachi has grown over the years under the teachings and guidance of Master Musicians like Jesus “Chuy” Guzman, Sergio “Checo” Alonzo, Juan Jimenez, of the Master Mariachi Apprentice program, just to name a few. These professional teachers and mentors have taken the young musicians to a whole new level. One of the Mariachi’s specialties is playing for weddings, quinceaneras, baptisms, and other Masses. The Mass is played with reverence and respect, with special attention to the liturgical parts of the ceremony. The complete Mariachi consists of: Two Trumpets, Three Violins, One Guitarron, One Vihuela, One Guitar, and a Harp (Arpa) and/or Accordion

El Mariachi Aguila Azteca el un Mariachi Juvenil especialisado en tocar toda la musica del genero de Mariachi. Con anos de experiecia, el Mariachi Aguila Azteca ha tocado en lugares variados de difrerente ambinente.Varios de los elementos han crecido bajo las ensenazas y guias de Maestros de la Musica como lo son Jesus “Chuy” Guzman, Sergio “Checo” Alonzo, Juan Jimenez, y otros maestros del codiciado Master Mariachi Apprentice Program. Estos maestros han sido la inspiracion para el crecimiento y desarrollo de estos nuevos talentos. Una de las especialidaded del Mariachi Aguila Azteca es tocar bodas, quinceaneras, bautisos, y otras Misas. Las Misas se tocan con respeto y reverencia tomando en cuenta todas las partes liturgicas. El Mariachi completo consiste en Dos Trompetas, Tres Violines, Guitarron, Vihuela, Guitarra, y Arpa o Accordion.
10 elements:5 violins,2 trumpets, guitar, vihuela, guitarron.

The Best kept secret in the high desert. Mariachi Aguila Real is a mariachi that has been entertaining crowds for years. The group is made up of local youths and young adults of the cities of Victorville and Hesperia under the direction of Director Saul Zecena. They entertain private parties as well as larger venues such as V.V.C Cinco de Mayo Celebration, Spice of Life, Victorville's Annual Mariachi Festival, events for the V.V Hispanic Chamber of Commerce and when able have done community services for organizations such as The Make- A- Wish Foundation and The Salvation Army to name a few. Currently they are offering mariachi classes.

Mariachi Aguilas De Mexico® initiated in April of the year 2005 under the direction of Mr. Juan Carlos Ozuna. The group consists of young musicians all from Ventura County with Mexican roots as far as Jalisco, Michoacan, Durango, Morelos and Mexicali, Baja California. They have shared the stage with great artist such as Gloria Trevi, Mercedes Castro, Yolanda Del Rio, Beatriz Adriana, Marisela, Paquita la del Barrio, Jenni Rivera and Gerardo Reyes. Mariachi Aguilas De Mexico® has the vision of keeping alive their culture, their traditions, and strive to touch their audience’s hearts with what they believe is to be the most beautiful music in the world…the music of Mexico.

El Mariachi Aguilas De Mexico® se inició en abril del año 2005 bajo la dirección de Juan Carlos Ozuna. El grupo esta compuesto de músicos jovenes; todos del condado de ventura y raices mexicanas desde jalisco, michoacan, durango, morelos y mexicali, baja california. Han compartido el escenario con artistas como Gloria Trevi, Mercedes Castro, Yolanda Del Rio, Beatriz Adriana, Marisela, Paquita la del Barrio, Jenni Rivera y Gerardo Reyes. El Mariachi Aguilas De Mexico® tiene la visión de mantener viva su cultura, sus tradiciones, y de tentar los corazones de su público con la música mas bella del mundo...la música mexicana.
SOMOS UN GRUPO CON TRAYECTORIA RECONOCIDA, OBSEQUIAMOS VIDEO Y CD
Grupo que por generaciones lleva emoción y alegría a todos los eventos.

Mariachi Alegre was established in 1994, It began with mostly local high school students from various high schools, such as Bowie HS, Burgess HS, Del Valle HS, and a few University of Texas at El Paso, mostly sophomores and freshmen. The mix was a perfect combination for the group, a lot of young talent with more experienced musicians. Through the years, Mariachi Alegre has gone on to perform at various venues, local gigs and many out of state and country performances, and competitions.

We are a traditional mariachi of 5-6 elements. We Play a combination of old and new repertoir including sones, rancheras, huapangos, cumbias, as well as some pop favorites and international hits. Our group consists of two trumpets, guitarron, vihuela and one or two violins. We speak spanish and english for booking purposes

Nuestro repertorio consiste de musica tradicional hasta el repertorio de pop. Tocamos sones, huapangos, rancheras, cumbias, y repertorio internacional. Hablamos Español e Inglés.

MARIACHI DE 9 INTEGRANTES, DOS ARMONIAS, DOS VIOLINES, DOS TROMPETAS, FLAUTA TRAVERSA, CANTANTE FEMENINA Y CANTANTE FEMENINA INFANTIL. 7 MUJERES DOS HOMBRES, GRAN CALIDAD Y UNICO EN BOGOTA CON TRAJE COLOR ALMENDRA
Music for all occasions. Can be seen Friday and Saturday night at the Crossroads Restaurant.

Our group consists of myself, my two brothers gilbert and rudy, my daughter meranda and also a very good friend that has been with us for a very long time whose name is ricardo. The rest of our members have been with us a little less time but have picked up on our style really fast. We play most of the traditional mariachi songs and also romanticas and conteimporary tunes. We are a group that not only plays very good music but also entertain our clients by having them sing along with us and entertain them with a short joke here and there. Sometimes we get them to shed a tear or two with some sentimentol tune but afterwards we get them to sing and dance one more time!. We love what we do with our mariachi group and hope that one day we have the opportunity to perform for you!
Un mariachi que sabe entretenr a sus clientes con mucha alegria, amor y carino. Te haremos cantar, te haremos reir, te haremos llorar, y luego te haremos cantar feliz de nuevo.

Mariachi Ameca was founded by Jaime Cervantes in 1991. Our band consists of 9 members most of which have had years of musical experience. Mariachi Ameca has accompanied many famous singers such as, Lucha Villa, Guadalupe Pineda, Pablo Montero, Aida Cuevas, and Napoleon. This band performed at Six Flags Great America for about ten years and also made an appearance in the movie "The Jackal" Starring, Bruce Willis. Our band has performed over the years at many events including festive parades, funerals, religious events, many private parties, and special events in Chicago and it's surrounding areas. We play a variety of traditional mexican music including, sones, boleros, popurris, polkas, rancheras, cumbias, and more. So if your searching for a mariachi to liven up your party make sure to give us a call.
Mariachi Ameca fue fundado por Jaime Cervantes en 1991. Nuestro mariachi está compuesto por 9 elementos que han tenido años de experiencia musical.

Mariachi Bello featuring Rafael & Esteban is The Bay Area's most popular Mariachi Act, bringing the traditional music of Mexico to your special event, party, wedding or celebration. The Group is perfect for any event where you need some fun music, whether strolling about or in a stage performance. The act is in the beautiful attire that is so well known with the mariachis. This group is easy to work with, professionally managed, reliable and accommodating to virtually any situation No extra charge for costumes: full, Mariachi (black/silver), Wedding Mariachi (ivory/gold), Mexican folk costumes, colorful tropical outfits, flamenco, cocktail or formal attire.

We are a traditional mariachi musicians of three (trio) or four(cuarteto) that performs the entire range of Mexican Songs. We Play a combination of old and new repertoire including sones, rancheras, huapangos, cumbias, as well as some pop favorites and international hits.

Nosotros somos musicos mariachis tradicionales de 3 elementos (trio) o cuatro(opcional) que interpretamos una vasta gama de canciones mexicanas. Tocamos una combinacion de un repertorio de antiguas y nuevos sones, rancheras , huapangos, cumbias asi como tambien algo defavoritas de pop y de hits internacionales.

Mariachi Calavera plays contemporary and traditional mariachi music. Mariachi music is an important tradition in Mexican communities. Our group offers the perfect touch to mark special occasions like weddings, anniversaries, birthdays, or corporate events. Whether you like the rich sound of the trumpet, the vibrant violin, or the fast strumming of the vihuela, Mariachi Calavera has the expertise and professionalism to make your event a grand celebration, an authentic Mexican fiesta! Mariachi Calavera proudly serves the Pacific Northwest including, Oregon, Washington, and Northern California.

Mariachi Camarillo was established in the year 1995, under the management of Marie Rivera. They have been since then, part of the mariachi movement in Ventura County. The group has performed all over the state of California and has even traveled to the state of Washington to perform in a mariachi festival. Mariachi Camarillo has been featured on TV and radio on numerous occasions. The group has played for many private parties, fundraisers, fairs, fiesta, school’s and church events. The group is available for any type of occasion. We’ve done it all from weddings, funerals, quinceañeras, bridal showers, bautismos, mañanitas, birthdays parties and much more. We are at your service and ready to liven up any party or get-togethers. The group is currently in the process of producing their very first CD, which will be available soon.

Mariachi Camarillo se creó en el año 1995, bajo la dirección de Marie Rivera. Han sido desde entonces, parte del movimiento mariachi en el condado de Ventura. El grupo ha realizado en todo el estado de California e incluso ha viajado al estado de Washington para llevar a cabo en un festival de mariachi. Mariachi Camarillo se ha destacado en la televisión y la radio en numerosas ocasiones. El grupo ha desempeñado durante muchos particulares, recaudación de fondos, ferias, fiestas, en escuelas y en la iglesia. El grupo está disponible para cualquier tipo de ocasión. Hemos hecho de todo desde bodas, funerales, quinceañeras, despedidas de Soltera, bautismos, Mañanitas, cumpleaños fiestas y mucho más. Estamos a su servicio y dispuesto a animar cualquiera de las fiestas o reuniones. El grupo se encuentra actualmente en el proceso de producción de su primer CD, que estará disponible pronto.

Mariachi Citlalli offers one of the best mariachi performances, they play all kind of music from quiet background music to the most traditional happy repertory, and they use a sound system (optional) which can be set to very low levels, to maximum for the ball room without any annoying listening problems.

Mariachi Cobras de Jalisco consists of 8 young members of the ages of 18-22. They have been performing professionally for 5 years now and have played in many important events. Also the band has had the priveledge of playing with many famous mariachis

Mariachi Cobras de Jalisco consiste de 8 miembros de las edades de 18-22 años de adad. teniendo hombres y mujeres.. han estado con muchos mariachis famosos como el mariachi sol de mexico y han estado en muchos eventos privados.

El Mariachi Colonial fue formado en 1969 bajo la direcion de Jesus Rodriguez. El Mariachi Colonial tiene 8 elementos y podemos brindarles una gran variedad de musica. Los ponemos a cantar, bailar, gritar, y hasta llorar. La familia Rodriguez tiene mas de 100 años de experencia en la musica de mariachi. Seria un placer para delaitarlos con nuestra musica.

A very talented Mariachi Band that performs traditional and original mariachi tunes. We sing in Spanish and English languages. We have 2 male singers and one female singer as well. Our standard size are five musicians that play guitarron (Mariachi bass guitar), vihuela (Mariachi guitar), violin, accordion and trumpet. We sound tight and professional and we travel all around New England and New York State. We have an excellent repertoire of more than 200 tunes for Weddings, serenatas, school performances and parties. We dress sharp and arrive on time!!

Un grupo de Mariachi muy talentoso con 2 cantantes masculinos y una cantante femenina. Cantamos la música tradicional y también temas originales del grupo. El grupo está compuesto por cinco músicos que tocan guitarron, vihuela, violin, acordión y trumpeta. Sonamos muy bien y viajamos por toda Nueva Inglaterra y el Estado de Nueva York. Tenemos un repertorio excelente para bodas, serenatas, conciertos escolares y todo tipo de evento. Siempre andamos bien presentados y llegamos a tiempo a nuestros eventos. Muchas gracias.

With over eight years of experience they have delighted audiences with their amazing vocals and lively interpretations of sones, huapangos and rancheras. If you want San Diego's best Mariachi, look no further. Our extensive client list, and our professionalism speak for themselves.

Mariachi Continental de San Diego de Fredd Sanchez es el Mariachi Premier de San Diego. San Antonio's first all-female professional mariachi group, Las Erendiras de San Antonio began in February 1996 as "Mariachi Erendira Xochitlan". The group formed as part of a promotion for the San Antonio Paseo del Rio Association Mariachi Festival. After the festival’s conclusion, the group continued to rehearse and in 1997 "Mariachi Femenil Las Erendiras de San Antonio" was born. The name "Erendira" is an Aztec derivative signifying "princess". The experience of these young ladies in action exemplifies the aura of their royal presence.
Mariachi Femenil Las Eréndiras de San Antonio

Mariachi Femenil Orgullo Mexicano, el primer mariachi femenil de la famosa Bahia de San Francisco California (en el Norte de California), comenzó su excitante carrera en el 2007. Esta distinguida agrupación esta compuesta de 10 mujeres únicas y singulares, cada una con una formación y experiencia diferente, pero unida por su pasión y respeto por la música de mariachi. Su rico sonido y animadas presentaciones es el producto de la pasión, disciplina, y experiencia de cada miembro que da como resultado una imagen vigorosa y elegante. Tienen un gran enfoque en la educación y soporte entre el grupo por su propios intereses educacionales y académicos. Tocando su música siempre con orgullo, El Mariachi Femenil Orgullo Mexicano se honra en representar la Cultura Mexicana, la tradición del mariachi y a la mujer en las artes.

Mariachi Femenil Orgullo Mexicano began their journey as the first all female Mariachi in the San Francisco, Bay Area (Northern California) in 2007. This distinct female ensemble is comprised of 10 women of varying ages and diverse backgrounds but their passion and respect for music is what unites them. Their rich sound and lively musicianship is the product of each member's passion, discipline and experience resulting in a strong yet elegant image. They have a strong focus on education and support each other in their musical and academic educational endeavors. As a group these ladies are committed to making a difference in their communities and providing a supportive venue for young women to express themselves artistically, enhance confidence and develop leadership skills. Playing always with pride, Mariachi Femenil Orgullo Mexicano is honored to represent the Mexican Culture, the Mariachi tradition and Women in the Arts.

Formed in the spring of 2001, Mariachi Femenil Flores Mexicanas has established itself as the premier all-female group of the Southwest captivating audiences from all over the world. The versatility of the mariachi is reflected in a wide-ranging repertoire that includes boleros, huapangos, corridos, sones and cumbias. All-female groups are a recent innovation in mariachi; however, Flores Mexicanas retain the traditional style of their music. Their rich sound and inspiring musicianship is the product of each member's discipline, experience, and passion promoting a strong yet elegant statement not typically seen in this traditionally male-dominated art form. Born of a region noted for its cultural diversity, the all-female ensemble continues to redefine the genre and break new ground in the United States.

Pero una cosa que todos ellos tienen en común es que todos ellos comparten la misma pasión…la pasión por la música y cultura Mexicana. Es su estilo único y sus nuevos arreglos que les han dado la oportunidad de compartir y tocar junto con grandes artistas como Jose Jose, Veronica y Christian Castro, Conjunto Primavera, Los Tigres del Norte, Los Tucanes de Tijuana, Tatiana y muchos mas. Pero la prioridad mas importante del Mariachi Franco es de complacer a su audiencia y de seguir la tradición mexicana mas importante...la tradición del mariachi!

Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra is a mariachi first organized in 2009 and is composed of local area youth varying between 13-19 years of age. The goal of Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra is to provide youth interested in learning to play mariachi music, which is a rare opportunity in our community. If your interested in being a part of Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra please contact Martin Lopez. It also provides an opportunity to learn more about the cultural history behind the music, improve self esteem, presentation skills, and communication skills of participating youth. Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra is growing in the number of participants and improving their musical talents to enrich our community. Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra has participated in many community functions such as the Boise Holiday Parade, where we were awarded 1st place " Best Musical Adaptation of the Theme", Martin Luther King Jr. Day, local area churches, Cinco De Mayo celebrations, Taco Feed Parades, festivals, and more.

Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra es un mariachi primer organizado en 2009 y está integrado por los jóvenes de área local oscila entre 13 a 19 años de edad. El objetivo del Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra es proporcionar a los jóvenes interesados en aprender a tocar música de mariachi, que es una oportunidad única en nuestra comunidad. Si usted esta interesado en ser parte del Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra puedes contactar a Martín López. También proporciona una oportunidad para aprender más sobre la historia cultural detrás de la música, mejorar la autoestima, habilidades de presentación, y habilidades de comunicación de los jóvenes participantes. Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra es cada vez mayor en el número de participantes y la mejor de sus talentos musicales para enriquecer nuestra comunidad. Mariachi Juvenil de Mi Tierra ha participado en muchas funciones, tales como el Desfile de Boise de vacaciones, en el que se adjudicaron el primer lugar "Mejor adaptación musical del tema".

The Mariachi Perla De Mexico was officially launched on March 14, 1997, with only seven items. Since then to date, has been considered by the media, businessmen, fellow guild and the general public as the best mariachi in Chicago. Four months after its founding, was named the official Mariachi all the events of the Mexican Civic Society of Illinois and the newspaper La Raza. In September the same year made his first recording, alternating with Mariachi Vargas De Tecalitlan and participated in the festival of Latinoamerica in Joliet, Illinois. From its beginnings until now, Perla De Mexico Mariachi is the most requested for recording local singers and the accompaniment of famous artists who visit Chicago and other major cities in Illinois.

El Mariachi Perla De México se inicio oficialmente el día 14 de Marzo de 1997, con solo siete elementos. Desde entonces a la fecha, ha sido considerado por los medios de comunicación, empresarios, compañeros de gremio y público en general como el mejor mariachi de Chicago. A cuatro meses de haberse fundado, fue nombrado el Mariachi oficial para todos los eventos de la Sociedad Cívica Mexicana de Illinois y del periódico La Raza. En Septiembre del mismo año realizo su primera grabación, alterno con el Mariachi Vargas De Tecalitlan y participo en el festival de música Latinoamérica en Joliet. Desde sus inicios y hasta el momento, Perla De México es el Mariachi más solicitado para grabaciones de cantantes locales y para el acompañamiento de artistas famosos que visitan Chicago y otras ciudades importantes de Illinois.

Considered Texas’ finest all female mariachi, Las Alteñas has been captivating audiences throughout the United States since 2002. Known for their exceptional stage presence, musical performances and strong vocals, they appeal to audiences of all generations and heritages. They have performed at many prestigious events and venues, auch asvthe Mariachi USA Festival at both the Hollywood Bowl & the AVA Ampitheatre in Tucson, & the Mariachi Spectacular in Albuquerque, NM. They also have perfomed at the Viva El Mariachi Festival in San Diego, CA & at the LULAC National Convention in Little Rock, AR. In Houston, TX they mesmerized a crowd of over 67,000 fans at the Go Tejano Mariachi Competition where they brought home 1st Place for “Best Mariachi” for 2 consecutive years. Other notable performances have been in Memphis, Chicago, Las Vegas, & Milwaukee. Recently they were chosen by the city of SA to represent the city on the show Good Morning America in NYC.

In the Fall of 2009, 8 men came together from all around the Southwest to create a mariachi group. Through the music of mariachi these 8 men hope to entertain, educate and keep alive the proud tradition and heritage of Mexico's music! Caballero means gentlemen or horseman. We as Caballeros strive to uphold the privilege of being called a Caballero both on and off stage.

A través de la música de mariachi estos 8 hombres, tienen la esperanza de entretener, educar y mantener viva la orgullosa tradición y el patrimonio de la música de México! Founded in 1993, by Director Roy Quintero, Mariachi Los Caporales is one of the most popular Mariachi groups in America. Mariachi Los Caporales consists of an eleven-piece ensemble. The group’s main focus - to preserve the rich, vibrant, traditional style - has rewarded Los Caporales with national recognition. The uniqueness of Mariachi Los Caporales is attributed to their strong voices, precision, harmony, execution and musical arrangements. While making use of influences from new contemporary styles; the group maintains the traditional rhythms of Mariachi music. Mariachi Los Caporales are constantly being invited to perform throughout the US. In addition, they are very proud of being asked back season after season to perform at Six Flags, Fiesta Texas in San Antonio since 1995.

Canada's Premier Mariachi Los Dorados was established in the city of Vancouver , BC. It was founded on May 5 th 2003 by its director Alex Alegria, his goal was to bring to Canada the traditional music of Mexico , best know as Mariachi music. Mariachi Los Dorados name comes from General Francisco Villa's army “ Los Dorados” in which some members were from North America. Los Dorados are well known through Western Canada for their mixture of Canadian and Mexican talent. These musicians deliver the passion, love and respect they feel for México and its culture. One of the missions of Mariachi Los Dorados is to maintain and promote the beauty of Mexico through its traditional and uplifting music.

Mariachi Los Gallitos is a Mexican Folkloric group composed of trumpet, violins, guitarron (acoustic bass), vihuela (guitar) and female lead singer. These classically trained performers have earned wide popularity and acclaim through their unique combination of technical and theatrical abilities.
Los Gallitos is based in Houston, Texas and has performed professionally for the past twenty seven years throughout Texas, the United States and abroad.

Mariachi Los Herradeos, the pride of San Antonio, consists of elite musicians selected from all over South Texas. While keeping traditional instrumentation, costumes, and music at the core, Mariachi Los Herraderos also appeals to wider audiences by performing Modern, Conjunto, Trio, Tejano, as well as English tunes. Mariachi Los Viajeros is a Vegas style show Mariachi, with an extensive repertoire that includes all traditional Mariachi music along with a wide selection of modern music in English and Spanish. Los Viajeros has been performing in the Las Vegas area for 3 years and has already performed for such events as the Latin Grammy’s, and has had an excellent relationship with the City of Las Vegas performing for Mayor Oscar Goodman and Senator Harry Reid on several occasions. Mariachi Los Viajeros is dedicated to promoting the positive image of an American Mariachi with strong roots in its Mexican heritage.

Mariachi Los Viajeros tiene un estilo unico en Las Vegas, con un amplio repertorio que incluye música tradicional de todos los Mariachi junto con una amplia selección de música moderna en Inglés y Español. Los Viajeros tiene el places de vivir y trabajar en Las Vegas durante 3 años y ya ha actuado en eventos como los Latin Grammys, y ha tenido una excelente relación con la ciudad de Las Vegas tocando para el alcalde Oscar Goodman, y el senador Harry Reid, en varias ocasiones. Mariachi Los Viajeros se dedica a promover la imagen positiva de un Mariachi Américano con fuertes raíces en su herencia mexicana.

As Mariachi Luna y Sol (MLS) finished off 2008 with a special requested performance for the former President and First Lady of Mexico, Mr. & Mrs. Vincente Fox—It was a grand event that ended with a big hug from Martha Fox saying, “Such talented musicians…please continue to treasure your culture by continuing to foster your music…” In 2007, Mariachi Luna y Sol was voted by the Omaha Entertainment Awards under the Live Music category as ‘Best Ethnic Group’ along with assisting Mannheim Steamroller at the Qwest concert in Omaha, NE. Recognized as the premier mariachi in the Midwest—it’s the only complete mariachi in the region that has a full ensemble of violins, guitars, vihuela, guitarron, trumpets and vocals—with their beautiful harmonies and soloists they have stunned crowds with unforgettable performances across the country from concerts to private events.

Formerly known as Mariachi Sol de America, the ensemble is nationally recognized as a premier mariachi group of Los Angeles. Mariachi Monumental de America provides an intense musical entertainment experience for your traditional, contemporary and classical tastes. A combination of versatile individual talent, performance style, and passion for mariachi music, brings Mariachi Monumental de America to be recognized as a world renown ensemble. Among many elite performances, Mariachi Monumental de America has had the honor and pleasure of sharing the stage with various artists such as Luis Miguel, Vicente Fernandez, Alejandro Fernandez, Juan Gabriel, Joan Sebastian, Pepe Aguilar, Cristian Castro, Pedro Fernandez, Los Temerarios among many more. With inspiration and dedication, this mariachi ensemble continues to raise the mariachi tradition to new heights.

Mariachi Mujer 2000 is the #1 All-Star Female Mariachi of the Millenium. The group is composed of some of the most talented women in the Unites States with power voices and instrumentally knowledgeable. Mariachi Mujer 2000 is currently available for festivals and special events.

Mariachi Mujer Internacional, the multitalented all-female mariachi, is the greatest female talent sensation to come out of San Antonio, Texas. Founded in the winter of 2008 by its experienced Director- Lucila Torres, the inception of the name "Mariachi Mujer Internacional" came about from the international cultural background of its members who come from both Mexico and the United States. Helping to unite these cultures is the international language of music. Music is the cohesive factor embracing the Mexican culture to the multiple cultures of the United States.

The Mujer Internacional membership is composed of seven, talented female musicians with a combined musical experience of over 40 years. Members of Mariachi Mujer Internacional have had the opportunity to share the stage with world renowned mariachi groups such as Mariachi Los Camperos de Nati Cano and "El Mejor Mariachi del Mundo" Mariachi Vargas de Tecalitlan. Recognized for its mariachi talents, Mariachi Mujer Internacional has played in various venues throughout Texas and venues in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, Baltimore, Maryland, New Jersey and California. The music and talent demonstrated by Mujer Internacional shows that “ La Mujer” conveys the beauty and resilience of a culture with traditions that make the family strong.

The Mariachi Nacional de Mexico is a high profile mariachi show group from Mexico City, Mexico. They specialize in concert performances as a mariachi show group and/or with a symphony orchestra. They may also perform for corporate events. The group is also available for providing musical arrangements and instruction at mariachi conference/workshops. The mariachi Nacional de Mexico also specializes in providing and performing arrangements with some of the world's best symphonies; and, as with the mariachi tradition, is very capable of accompanying solo singers.

El Mariachi Nacional de Mexico, dirigido por Tony Covarrubias es una agrupacion de primer nivel radicada en la Ciudad de Mexico. Se especializa en conciertos y actuaciones con su propio show de mariachi en Festivales de Mariachi y Festivales culturales, teniendo tambien la opcion de conjuntar mariachi y orquesta sinfonica. Es de los pocos grupòs que tambien organizan talleres de mariachi para instruccion de musicos y su equipo de trabajo realiza arreglos musicales para comerciales de radio y tv, asi como musicalizar movies. El mariachi Nacional de Mexico tiene la capacidad de realizar arreglos musicales y acompañamiento a cantantes solistas, Tony Covarrubias, su director ha trabajado con una gran cantidad de solistas de fama mundial como: Lucero, Miguel Aceves Mejía, Lucha Villa, Roberto Carlos, José José, Vicente Fernández, José Luis Rodríguez, Raphael, Soledad Bravo, Rocío Durcal, Rocío Jurado, Aída Cuevas, Alejandro Fernández, Antonio Aguilar, Pedro Fernández, Manuel Jerena, Lola

One of the best known bands of traditional Mexican music in Florida is “MARIACHI PANCHO VILLA”. As a group, Mariachi Pancho Villa has been in existence for well over 15 years. Since its beginning in 1995 Mariachi Pancho Villa has displayed an enthusiasm in its music, performing, professionalism and dedication which it has established itself as a leader in its genre under the direction of its founder and bandleader Henry Meneses. The Mariachi Pancho Villa Band is located in West Palm Beach, a large and multicultural area in Florida, where Mariachi Pancho Villa has achieved reputation that has allowed it to perform in hundreds of events with a very extensive and varied repertoire of music and songs for different Cultures, so despite the fact that the Mariachi Pancho Villa plays traditional Mexican Music they also play Instrumental, Cumbias, Sones, Polcas, and more, Entertaining and arranging events according to customer needs and wants.

Una de las mejores bandas de Mariachi tradicional Mexicano en florida es El MARIACHI PANCHO VILLA, Hemos estado en existencia por mas de 15 anos. Desde sus comienzos Mariachi Pancho Villa ha mostrado entusiamso en su musica, presentacion, profesionalismo y dedicacion la cual se ha establecido por si mismo como un lider en su genero bajo la direccion de su fundador Henry Meneses. Mariachi Pancho Villa esta localizado en West Palm Beach una multicultural area donde se ha ganado la reputacion de la gente y le ha permitido presentarse en cientos de eventos con un extenso y variado repertorio de musica y canciones para diferentes culturas. Asi que apesar de que el Mariachi toca tradicional musica Mexicana ellos tambien tocan , Instrumental, Clasica, Cumbias, Sones, Polcas, y mucho mas. Entreteniendo cada evento de acuerdo a las necesidades y gustos del Cliente

MARIACHI PUÑO DE ORO Mariachi Puño de Oro is comprised by the most advanced students of Rhythmo Inc. A Non-Profit Organization who runs an exciting Mariachi Music Program for boys and girls in the City of Anaheim California. Under the direction of Maestro Gabriel B. Zavala an experienced mariachi musician, teacher, arranger and composer. Mariachi Puño de Oro has performed in many important venues including performances in at the Disneyland Resort, Knott’s Berry farm, The Million Dollar Theater and several presentations at the Orange County Fairgrounds. They were the second place winners of the 2010 Sixth Annual San Juan Capistrano Mission “Battle of the Mariachis” chosen among 10 of the most talented Youth Mariachi Groups of Southern California. Brace yourself and enjoy the music of: ! MARIACHI PUÑO DE ORO!

Mariachi Puño de Oro BIOGRAFIA El Mariachi Puño de Oro es originarion de la ciudad de Anaheim, California. El grupo esta formado por los estudiantes más sobresalientes de RHYTHMO, INC. Una organización no lucrativa dedicada a desarrollar un programa mariachi para jóvenes que dirige el señor Gabriel B. Zavala. El Maestro Zavala, es un experimentado músico, arreglista y compositor con mas de 40 años de experiencia en la musica de mariachi. Los integrantes del Mariachi Puño de Oro han participado en los talleres de musica de Tucson Arizona por varios años consecutivos. Se han presentado en los lugares mas importantes del sur de California como son: La Feria del Condado de Orange, en Knotts Berry Farm, y en el gran Marathon Anual patrocinado por Disney.

Mariachi Quetzal was formed in the summer of 2008 in Denton, Texas. The original 10 members met while performing in college and other professional mariachis. The ensemble is composed of accomplished vocalists and instrumentalists from various backgrounds, all of whom are students or alumni of the University of North Texas(UNT) College Of Music. Not only has Mariachi Quetzal performed in their native Dallas-Fort Worth area, but they have also played in Oklahoma, Arkansas, Colorado, Kansas and New York City. Mariachi Quetzal performs annually at the Texas State Fair and has collaborated with Bubba Hernandez and the Grammy Award-winning band Brave Combo. Quetzal is committed to mentoring young mariachi musicians; group members have served as clinicians to many public school mariachi programs in North Texas and also teach at UNT's annual summer mariachi camp. Mariachi Quetzal strives to bring new life and interest to the rich tradition that is mariachi music. Hablamos Español.

Mariachi Rayos Del Sol was formed with the vision of preserving the Mexican culture in today's youth. More and more Chicano youth is seen in losing touch with their culture and assimilating to the "American Culture". The young people that make up Mariachi Rayos Del Sol not only have a deep understanding of who they are and where they came from, but they have a sincere passion for the Mariachi culture itself. The members vary in ages from 15-17 and have been playing together (as Mariachi Chavez, of Cesar Chavez High School) for 4 years. These young musicians have played at local parties and political luncheons, and have also been featured on UNIVISION's "Al Despertar". And in March of 2010, had the honor and the privilege of playing for the world renowned Cirque Du Soleil. You can catch Mariachi Rayos Del Sol Every Sunday from 12pm-2pm at Garibaldis Mexican Restaurant,1675 East Mariposa Road, Stockton, CA.‎

Mariachi Rayos del Sol de Austin started in March 2011 under the New Management of Jacy Milicia and Director Jose Macias. Mariachi Rayos del Sol de Austin has a new energetic sound yet still authentic to Mexico. All of the musicians of Mariachi Rayos del Sol de Austin are true professionals with years of experience.

Mariachi Rayos del Sol de Austin tiene un nuevo sonido energético todavía todavía auténtico a México. Mariachi Real de Chihuahua is a semi-professional mariachi group that was founded in the heart of the Mesilla Valley in Las Cruces, NM in January of 2005. Mariachi Real is dedicated to preserving and promoting our beautiful culture through our intense love of the music and the people it represents.

Mariachi Real de Mexico was founded in 1991 in New York City by Ramon Ponce Sr. and Ramon Ponce Jr. Since the beginning the group has had great acceptance, bringing Mexican traditional music to all audiences.

Founded in 1978, Mariachi Real de San Diego has established itself as a leader in its genre under the direction of its founder and leader, Pedro Gonzalez. Professionalism, dedication, and loyalty to the century old traditions of the music and culture of Mexico continue to drive this group to new heights. This Mariachi group has appeared in various movies including "Top Dog", starring Chuck Norris, "Deadly Desire" starring Jack Scalia, the TV mini series "Space" with James Garner, as well as tv commercials for the Del Mar Racing Season. Mariachi Real has also performed for the Republican National Convention, two Super Bowls, the World Series, the All-Star Game and countless festivals and special events for international corporations and dignitaries.

Mariachi Veritas de Harvard was started in 2001 by Harvard graduate Claudia Garcia. We are comprised entirely of Harvard students and are the first and only 100% student mariachi on the East Coast. Many of us had not heard mariachi before joining the group, but we all played different styles of music before joining Mariachi Veritas. We are all essentially self-taught, receive no faculty oversight, and are responsible for the musical and organizational development of the group. We have played numerous shows over the past several years, including for celebrities and notable figures such as President of Mexico Felipe Calderon, former President of Mexico Vicente Fox, George Lopez, Wyclef Jean, Brad Pitt, Dan Akroyd, and Salma Hayek, among others. In December 2007, Mariachi Veritas de Harvard won third place in the University Group Competition level at the Mariachi Vargas Extravaganza in San Antonio, Texas.

Mariachi Véritas de Harvard se inició en 2001 por Claudia Garcia, una estudiante anterior de Harvard. Somos un grupo compuesto solamente de estudiantes de Harvard y somos la primera y única banda mariachi de estudiantes en la costa este. Algunos de nosotros nunca habíamos escuchado la música de mariachi antes de ser miembros del grupo, pero todos eramos músicos en otros estilos. Ahora aprendimos el estilo de los mariachis y nos ayudamos con el desarrollo músical del grupo. Hemos tocados muchos shows en nuestra corta historia, incluyendo para celebridades y personas notables como el Presidente de México Felipe Calderón, el Presidente Anterior de México Vicente Fox, George Lopez, Wyclef Jean, Brad Pitt, Dan Akroyd y Salma Hayek. En el año 2007, Mariachi Véritas ganó el tercer lugar en la Competición de Grupos de Universidades en el Mariachi Vargas Extravaganza en San Antonio, Texas.

Mariachi Zacatecas was founded in 1963 by Abigail Yáñez, a native of Nochistlan, Zacatecas, Mexico. In time, the Mexican community in Northern California grew and Mariachi Zacatecas was established as the first and only mariachi group in the north of California. In 1978, founder Abigail Yáñez appointed his son, Rosario Yáñez, to be the director of the group. Since then, Mariachi Zacatecas has been a role-model for many of the newer mariachi groups in the region. Mariachi Zacatecas has had the honor of accompanying many famous artists such as Antonio Aguilar, Lola Beltran, Lucha Villa, Aida Cuevas, Linda Ronstandt, Yolanda Del Rio, Nydia Rojas, Gerardo Reyes, Rosenda Bernal, Chelo y Yesenia Flores, Graciela Beltran, Grupo Sparx and many more! Mariachi Zacatecas has also had the honor of performing for political figures such as the former Senator Robert F. Kennedy, and for the former Presidents of the United States, Richard Nixon, Gerald Ford, Ronald Regan and George Bush.

El Mariachi Zacatecas fue fundado en el año 1963 en Sacramento, California por el Señor Abigail Yañez originario de Nochistlan, Zacatecas. En el año 1978 el Sr. Abigail Yañez, fundador del Mariachi Zacatecas, credio la direccion a su hijo Rosario Yañez. Desde entonces el Mariachi Zacatecas, ya con una fama establecida en el norte de California, ha sido el pilar para muchos de los mariachis e integrantes de mariachi que actualmente existen en la region. A pesar de su humilde formaccion, el Mariachi Zacatecas ha tenido el honor de acompañar a muchos artistas como Antonio Aguilar, Lola Beltran, Lucha Villa, Aida Cuevas, Linda Ronstandt, Yolanda Del Rio, Nydia Rojas, Gerardo Reyes, Chelo y Yesenia Flores, Graciela Beltran, Grupo Sparx y muchos mas! El Mariachi Zacatecas tambien ha tenido el honor de tocar para figuras politicas como el Senador Robert F. Kennedy y para los ex-presidentes de los Estados Unidos, Richard Nixon, Gerald Ford, Ronald Regan y George Bush.
